document.full_text: u.s. director terrence malick brings his eagerly anticipated drama "the tree of life" to the cannes film festival on monday, ending a long wait for movie fans and critics intrigued by only his fifth feature.
document.title: long wait over as terrence malick film hits cannes
lines_and_colors: u.s. director terrence malick brings his eagerly anticipated drama "the tree of life" to the cannes film festival on monday, ending a long wait for movie fans and critics intrigued by only his fifth feature.
